post.body:
"Thug Life" is an upcoming Tamil-language gangster action drama directed by Mani Ratnam and co-written with Kamal Haasan. The film features an ensemble cast, including Haasan, Silambarasan, and Trisha Krishnan, marking the reunion of Haasan and Ratnam since "Nayakan" (1987).

Officially announced in November 2022, with locations across Chennai, Pondicherry, and New Delhi. The film boasts a score by A. R. Rahman and cinematography by Ravi K. Chandran.

"Thug Life" is set for a worldwide theatrical release on June 5, 2025. Our studio is proud to be handling the visual effects for this exciting project.
